org.smtlib

Interface ILogic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAccept, ILanguage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AUFLIA, AUFLIRA, AUFNIRA, Logic, LRA, QF_ABV, QF_AUFBV, QF_AUFLIA, QF_AX, QF_BV, QF_IDL, QF_LIA, QF_LRA, QF_NIA, QF_NRA, QF_RDL, QF_UF, QF_UFBV, QF_UFIDL, QF_UFLIA, QF_UFLRA, QF_UFNRA, SMTExpr.Logic, UFLRA, UFNIA

    public interface ILogic
extends IAccept, ILanguage
    This interface represents a definition of an SMT_LIB logic
